Package nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core.hooks

Class ProtectionHookManagerSpigot

java.lang.Object
nl.pim16aap2.animatedarchitecture.spigot.core.hooks.ProtectionHookManagerSpigot
All Implemented Interfaces:
IDebuggable, IProtectionHookManager, IRestartable, org.bukkit.event.Listener
@Singleton public final class ProtectionHookManagerSpigot extends Object implements IRestartable, org.bukkit.event.Listener, IProtectionHookManager, IDebuggable
Class that manages all IProtectionHookSpigot instances and provides a unified interface to them.

    • getRegisteredHookDefinitions

      public Map<String,IProtectionHookSpigotSpecification> getRegisteredHookDefinitions()
      Getter for all registered protection hook specifications.

      A registered specification can be used to load the hook it specifies when needed.

      Returns:
      The registered IProtectionHookSpigotSpecification instances.

    • canSkipCheck

      public boolean canSkipCheck()
      Specified by:
      canSkipCheck in interface IProtectionHookManager
      Returns:
